text: Alessandra Panaro (14 December 1939 â€“ 1 May 2019) was an Italian movie actress active from late 1950s and early 1960s. She was born in Rome. Her best known role was in Dino Risi's comedy Poveri ma belli in 1959 and Luchino Visconti's crime drama Rocco e i suoi fratelli in 1960. Panaro died at a hospital in Geneva, Switzerland on 1 May 2019, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Alessandra Panaro
